name: One Night in Oga City
description:
A visual novel I made for the OpenGameArt Fall 2020 Game Jam.

Explore a city named Oga City, at night.

The file "readAFTERplaying.txt" describes the 2 biggest secrets of this game. As its name suggest, do not read it before playing if you do not want to get spoiled. However, after playing the game you can check you did not miss things by reading this file.

Warning : the game might be considered as "not safe for work" (some references to alcohol, some familiar language).

CREDITS :
